name: Selamawit Bekele
content: Zion elevated our Ethiopian coffee brand with a distinct identity rooted in our culture. The strategy and execution were meticulous and impactful.

name: Hailu Gebremariam
content: The fintech app UI/UX is clean and intuitive. Our onboarding friction dropped significantly after launch. Zion understood local user needs very well.

name: Meron Tadesse
content: Our magazine redesign is a visual celebration of Addis. Typography and layout choices are world-class and resonate with our audience.

name: Samuel Getachew
content: Complex information was turned into clear, engaging visuals. The annual report and campaign assets received excellent stakeholder feedback.

name: Lulit Assefa
content: Our brand now feels handcrafted and modernâ€”exactly what we wanted. Customers love the packaging and storefront graphics.

name: Yared Alemu
content: The dashboard design made financial tracking simple and delightful. Daily active usage increased notably post-release.

name: Hanna Kidane
content: The illustrations brought Ethiopian stories and characters to life with warmth and authenticity. Children are captivated.

name: Bethlehem Abate
content: Professional, collaborative, and timely. The brand system is cohesive across packaging, events, and digital touchpoints.
